includes.include:
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsGenre $INFO[ListItem.Genre] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Genre)+!Container.Content(genres)

ViewDetailsBullet !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Genre)+Integer.IsGreater(Container(1997).NumItems,0) + Container.Content(albums)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall yellow [I]($INFO[Container(1997).NumItems] $LOCALIZE[134])[/I] Container.Content(albums)+Integer.IsGreater(Container(1997).NumItems,1)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall yellow [I]($INFO[Container(1997).NumItems] $LOCALIZE[179])[/I] Container.Content(albums)+ !Integer.IsGreater(Container(1997).NumItems,1)
-->
ViewDetailsBullet !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Premiered) + Container.Content(episodes)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsYear $LOCALIZE[20416] $INFO[ListItem.Premiered] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Premiered) + Container.Content(episodes)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsEpisodes $INFO[ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons)] $LOCALIZE[33054] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons)) + Container.Content(tvshows) + Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons),1)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsEpisodes $INFO[ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons)] $LOCALIZE[20373] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons)) + Container.Content(tvshows) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons),1)
ViewDetailsBullet !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalSeasons)) + Container.Content(tvshows)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsEpisodes $INFO[ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)] $LOCALIZE[20359] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)]+ !Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes),1)
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsEpisodes $INFO[ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)] $LOCALIZE[20360] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)]+ Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes),1)
ViewDetailsBullet !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)]
auto 30 center METF_MediaDetailsSmall MediaDetailsEpisodes $INFO[ListItem.Property(UnWatchedEpisodes)] $LOCALIZE[16101] !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(TotalEpisodes)) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)]
